~/.config/rofi/scripts/launchers/type-7/: bash -c 'SELECTED=$(hyprctl clients -j | jq -r ".[] | \"\(.title // \"(no title)\") | \(.class)\"" | rofi -dmenu -p "Select Window:" -theme menu.rasi -matching fuzzy) && CLASS=$(echo "$SELECTED" | cut -d"|" -f2 | xargs) && echo -n "$CLASS" | wl-copy && dunstify -i window_list "Find Window Class" "Window class \"$CLASS\" copied to clipboard"'
hyprctl reload && dunstify -i window_list "Successfully reloaded Hyprland"
